ygData.subject: Re: test
ygData.msgSnippet: not at all, I make mixing bowls :) Not only are they very profitable to begin with, but add charisma raising items and they re MUCH better. They re high cost
ygData.messageBody:
not at all, I make mixing bowls :) Not only are they very profitable to begin
with, but add charisma raising items and they're MUCH better. They're high cost
items, so a little charisma goes a long way :) One charisma buff from a shaman
almost jumps the price up 1 gold per bowl :)
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

"John A. Hoskin" wrote:

> From: "John A. Hoskin" <irex@...>
>
> 30pp an hour.. wowsa.
>
> 15 is about my limit. I have to run through 4 zones just for material.
> I'm an Ogre.
>
> What are you making, if you don't mind telling?
>
> Behemot
> Ogre Shaman
> Master Potter
>
> At 01:42 AM 7/8/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Nick Emmerich <seorin@...>
> >
> >I'm out here :) Guess us potters aren't too popular, but we're the ones that
> >get the money =P You should see the EQBrewers list... they're excited about
> >new items (understandable) and are hoping to make more than 30 plat an hour
> >with it. I can make at least twice that with my lovely potting skill :)
> >Gotta love it
> >-Rennin of E'Ci
> > Trade Council GM
